headline.main: The Yogi and the Commissar; Mahatma Gandhi's 100th birthday was last Thursday ' Gandhi was the greatest living anachronism of the 20th century' Mahatma Gandhi " One might say that Gandhi seduced women into chastity" Gandhi's methods had their Himalayan inconsistencies All India loved it when Gandhi wore his loincloth to Buckingham Palace
